item.name: Cape d'Estaing
item.address1: PO Box 214, Kingscote, Kangaroo Island, SA 5223
item.description: Graham and Jude Allison, Alan and Ann Byers, Marg and Wayne Conaghty and Robin and Heather Moody have established 10ha of cabernet sauvignon and shiraz near Wisanger on Kangaroo Island. Robin Moody was a long-serving senior employee of Southcorp and has a broad knowledge of all aspects of grapegrowing and winemaking. Exports to the US.
